title: Cylinder Head, Remove and Install (Z20 LET)

steps.text: Release screen wash reservoir from support bracket

substeps.text: Position screen wash reservoir to one side

steps.text: Disconnect battery negative lead
Remove engine cover

substeps.text: Apply match mark to engine cover 2x hinge

steps.text: Disconnect intercooler hose (1) from connecting pipe for throttle body

substeps.text: Position intercooler hose (1) to one side

steps.text: Disconnect harness connector (1) for secondary oxygen sensor from engine harness

substeps.text: Lower harness through aperture of left rear inner wheel

steps.text: Raise vehicle
Remove engine undertray (1)
Remove exhaust undertray (2)
Drain coolant
Remove secondary catalytic converter (1)

substeps.text: Release secondary catalytic converter (1) from rubber mounting

steps.text: Remove hose (3) from turbocharger (2) and intercooler (1)
Release heat shield for turbocharger from cylinder block
Disconnect oil return pipe for turbocharger
Disconnect oil feed pipe from connecting pipe for turbocharger
Release connecting pipe for turbocharger from cylinder block
Disconnect harness connector (1) from oil level sensor (2)
Release vacuum tank support bracket (2) from intake manifold
Lower vehicle to suitable working height
Remove rear road wheel from right side

substeps.text: Use special socket located under front bonnet

steps.text: Remove right rear wheel arch liner
Remove intercooler hose (1) from intercooler
Remove upper front cover (2) for timing belt
Remove ribbed V-belt

substeps.text: Using suitable spanner rotate tensioner (1) clockwise, then

Using suitable spanner rotate tensioner (1) clockwise, then
Install suitable locking pin (2)

steps.text: Remove crankshaft pulley

substeps.text: Apply match marks to crankshaft pulley and crankshaft
Use suitable tool to counter-hold centre bolt on crankshaft

Use suitable tool to counter-hold centre bolt on crankshaft
sprocket

steps.text: Remove ribbed V-belt tensioner
Remove lower cover for timing belt
Release rear cover (2) for timing belt

substeps.text: Rotate crankshaft in normal direction of rotation until 3x bolt

steps.text: Rotate crankshaft in normal direction of rotation to Top Dead Centre (TDC) on cylinder no. 1, until timing marks (2) and (1) are aligned
Lock camshafts in position
Release tension from timing belt

substeps.text: Release bolt, then turn adjusting eccentric clockwise in

steps.text: Remove timing belt from pulleys

substeps.text: Position timing belt to one side

steps.text: Lower vehicle
Remove air intake hose with engine breather hose
Remove support bracket (1) for air intake and engine lifting eye from cylinder head
Remove heat shield (1) from support bracket (2) on cylinder head
Remove support bracket (1) for heat shield from cylinder head
Disconnect harness connector (2) from switchover valve (1) on turbocharger
Disconnect vacuum hose (3) from turbocharger
Remove guide tube (4) for oil level dipstick from cylinder block
Disconnect aeration hose (1) and upper coolant hose (3) from thermostat housing
Disconnect coolant feed hose (1) from turbocharger, then secure to one side
Disconnect coolant return hose from turbocharger
Disconnect harness connector for primary oxygen sensor (1) from engine harness
Release heat shield for turbocharger from transmission housing
Remove exhaust manifold and turbocharger assembly from cylinder head
Disconnect breather hose (1) from cylinder head cover (3)
Disconnect vacuum hose (1) from cylinder head cover (2)
Disconnect vacuum hose (1) from fuel pressure regulator (2)
Disconnect vacuum hose for switchover valve from throttle body
Disconnect 2x coolant hose (1) from throttle body
Disconnect vacuum hose (1) for fuel purge valve from intake manifold

Remove throttle body (1) from intake manifold
Release fuel pressure from fuel system

substeps.text: Collect any escaping fuel in a suitable container

steps.text: Remove Pressure Tester KM-J-34730-91 (1)
Disconnect harness connector (1) from ignition module
Remove cover (2) for ignition module from cylinder head cover
Disconnect harness connector (1) from camshaft sensor
Release crankshaft position sensor (1) from cylinder block
Release 3x harness from cylinder head cover
Remove upper support bracket (2) for alternator
Remove side support bracket (2) for alternator
Disconnect engine harness from main harness on right side
Release fuel rail assembly (3) from intake manifold

substeps.text: Position fuel rail assembly to one side

steps.text: Remove cover (2) from housing for injector harness
Disconnect 2x earth connector (2) from intake manifold
Disconnect vacuum pipe (1) for brake servo from intake manifold
Remove intake manifold from vehicle
Disconnect coolant hose (1) for oil cooler from coolant bypass housing (3)
Release harness connector (1) for primary oxygen sensor from harness support bracket (2)
Release harness support bracket (2) from cylinder head

Remove cylinder head cover from cylinder head

substeps.text: Remove, then discard 10 x O ring, gasket

Remove 2x camshaft pulley (2) and (3)

substeps.text: Remove, then discard front oil seal

steps.text: Remove exhaust camshaft (1)

substeps.text: Remove, then discard front oil seal

steps.text: Remove cylinder head from cylinder block
Remove, then discard cylinder head gasket
Clean mating surfaces
Check cylinder head for plane surface - see operation “ Cylinder Head, Check for Plane Surface (Z 20 LET) ”
Install new cylinder head gasket to cylinder block
Install cylinder head to cylinder block

substeps.text: Install, then secure 10x new bolt 25 Nm

steps.text: Install new oil seal to exhaust camshaft
Install exhaust camshaft to cylinder head
Install new oil seal to intake camshaft
Install intake camshaft to cylinder head
Install pulley to exhaust camshaft

substeps.text: Install, then secure new bolt, washer 50 Nm) + 60° + 15°

steps.text: Install pulley to intake camshaft

substeps.text: Install, then secure new bolt, washer 50 Nm + 60° + 15°

steps.text: Install cylinder head cover to cylinder head

substeps.text: Install 10 x new O ring, new gasket

steps.text: Check alignment of 2x camshaft with notches on cylinder head cover
Install ignition module to cylinder head cover
Connect hose for auxiliary pump to distribution housing
Connect harness connector to temperature switch
Secure harness support bracket to cylinder head
Secure harness connector for primary oxygen sensor to harness support bracket
Connect coolant hose for oil cooler to coolant bypass housing
Install intake manifold to cylinder head

substeps.text: Install, then secure bolt, 7x new nut 22 Nm

steps.text: Connect vacuum pipe for brake servo to intake manifold
Connect 2x earth connector to intake manifold
Install side support bracket for alternator
Install cover to housing for injector harness
Secure fuel rail assembly to intake manifold Install, then secure 2x bolt 8 Nm
Connect engine harness to main harness on right side
Install upper support bracket for alternator
Secure crankshaft position sensor to cylinder block

Connect harness connector to camshaft sensor
Install cover for ignition module to cylinder head cover
Connect harness connector to ignition module

Connect vacuum hose for switchover valve to throttle body
Connect vacuum hose to fuel pressure regulator
Connect harness connector to throttle position sensor
Connect vacuum hose for fuel purge valve to intake manifold
Connect 2x coolant hose to throttle body
Connect vacuum hose to cylinder head cover
Connect breather hose to cylinder head cover
Connect aeration hose and upper coolant hose to thermostat housing
Install exhaust manifold and turbocharger assembly with new gasket to cylinder head
Connect vacuum hose to turbocharger
Connect harness connector to switchover valve on turbocharger
Install guide tube for oil level dipstick with 2x new O ring to cylinder block
Secure heat shield for turbocharger to transmission housing
Connect harness connector for primary oxygen sensor to engine harness

substeps.text: Install, then secure new cable tie

steps.text: Connect coolant return hose to turbocharger
Install support bracket for air intake with engine lifting eye to cylinder head
Connect coolant feed hose to turbocharger

substeps.text: Connect pipe banjo with 2x new seal ring

steps.text: Install support bracket for heat shield to cylinder head
Install heat shield to support bracket on cylinder head
Install air intake hose with engine breather hose

substeps.text: Install, then secure new cable tie

steps.text: Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Check alignment of all timing marks
Lock camshafts in position
Install timing belt to pulleys
Tension timing belt

substeps.text: Rotate eccentric for tension roller anti-clockwise until
Release bolt of timing belt tensioner, then rotate eccentric
Rotate engine two complete revolutions in direction of rotation

steps.text: Secure rear cover for timing belt to cylinder head

substeps.text: Rotate crankshaft in normal direction of rotation until 3x bolt

steps.text: Install lower cover for timing belt
Install ribbed V-belt tensioner
Install crankshaft pulley

substeps.text: Use suitable tool to counter-hold centre bolt on crankshaft

Use suitable tool to counter-hold centre bolt on crankshaft
sprocket

steps.text: Install upper front cover for timing belt
Install intercooler hose to intercooler

substeps.text: Install, then secure 4x new cable tie

steps.text: Install right rear wheel arch liner
Install rear road wheel
Raise vehicle
Install ribbed V-belt

substeps.text: Rotate tensioner clockwise, then remove locking pin

steps.text: Secure vacuum tank support bracket to intake manifold
Connect oil feed pipe to connecting pipe for turbocharger
Secure connecting pipe for turbocharger to cylinder block
Connect oil return pipe for turbocharger

substeps.text: Install 2x new seal ring to banjo bolt
Install, then secure pipe union bolt 30

steps.text: Connect harness connector to oil level sensor
Secure heat shield for turbocharger to cylinder block
Install hose to turbocharger and intercooler

substeps.text: Install, then secure new cable tie

steps.text: Install secondary catalytic converter

substeps.text: Secure secondary catalytic converter to rubber mounting and

steps.text: Connect lower hose to coolant pipe of left side chassis
Install engine undertray
Install exhaust undertray

substeps.text: Install, then secure 12x bolt, 12x washer, 2x clip

steps.text: Lower vehicle
Secure rear road wheel
Connect harness connector for secondary oxygen sensor to engine harness

substeps.text: Guide harness through aperture of left rear inner wheel
Install, then secure new cable tie

steps.text: Connect intercooler hose to connecting pipe for throttle body
Install engine cover
Connect battery negative lead
Secure screen wash reservoir to support bracket
Fill and bleed cooling system - see operation “Cooling System, Drain, Fill and Bleed”
Check engine oil level, then top up if required
Program all volatile memories

Install, then secure 10x new bolt 25 Nm + 90° + 90° + 90° + 15°

Install, then secure bolt 20 Nm , washer
Install, then secure 4x bolt 9 Nm
Important: Observe tightening sequence. Wait 5 minutes, then re-tighten 10x nut 8 Nm .

Tighten 4x bolt, security bolt 90 Nm

warnings:
A four-post hoist must
be used to raise the vehicle when removing the engine undertray.
The vehicle can be moved to a two-post hoist for other operations
if required.

Observe relevant
environmental requirements when disposing of used engine oil.

Fuel may escape
– observe the safety regulations and relevant national
legislation.

Note position of
bearing caps before disassembling. Ensure bearing caps are released
from bearing seats evenly in stages of 1/2 to 1 turn in spiral
pattern starting outwards to inwards.

Ensure cylinder head
bolts are released from seats evenly in stages of 1/4 turn, then
1/2 turn in spiral pattern starting from centre outwards.

Ensure cylinder head
gasket is correctly positioned on dowels of cylinder block. Observe
direction marks of new gasket, “ OBEN/TOP ” mark
uppermost and towards exhaust side of engine.

Tighten cylinder head
bolts in spiral pattern starting from centre outwards.

Do not apply sealant
to oil duct area. Lubricate journals and lobes of camshaft with
lubricating paste. Install bearing caps to previously marked
position. Ensure bearing caps are secured to bearing seats evenly
in stages of 1/2 to 1 turn in spiral pattern starting inwards to
outwards.

Lubricate journals and
lobes of camshaft with lubricating paste. Install bearing caps to
previously marked position. Ensure bearing caps are secured to
bearing seats evenly in stages of 1/2 to 1 turn in spiral pattern
starting inwards to outwards.

Observe tightening
sequence. Wait 5 minutes, then re-tighten 10x nut 8 Nm .
notes:
Remove 6x bolt, 6x washer, 2x shim
 Shims may vary
for cover alignment.
 Note:   2x technician
required.

Install, then secure bolt
 Clean, then apply
locking compound to thread of bolt for lifting eye.

Install 2x shim, 6x washer, 6x bolt

required.
